mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_ADM_MERCHANT_INFO(MERCHANT_NM, MERCHANT_CONTACT, STD_DT, BLOCK_YN, REG_DT, UPD_DT, UPD_ID, BLOCK_DT, BLOCK_ID) VALUES (#{merchantNm}, #{merchantContact}, #{stdDt}, 'N', DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), '', null, '')
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TB_ADM_MERCHANT_INFO WHERE STR_TO_DATE(STD_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND STR_TO_DATE(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')

SELECT * FROM TB_ADM_MERCHANT_INFO WHERE 1=1
AND MERCHANT_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{merchantNm}, '%')
AND STR_TO_DATE(STD_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND STR_TO_DATE(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')
